description.raw:
This is a precursor to a pull request that will cause tests to be linked only with the required libraries. This can greatly speed up test compilation for low-level libraries. The first commit ( a304ef9 ) is most useful, as it ensures that math tests don't have an implicit dependency on gazebo common (through AutoLogFixture). Three other commits remove an un-needed dependency from other tests.

* a304ef9: Remove dependency of gazebo math tests on common: don't use AutoLogFixture

* 68c37a6: Use AutoLogFixture instead of ServerFixture for Battery and RenderingConversions tests

* 2f8cc88: Remove gazebo::common dependency from EXAMPLE_* test

* 38e0c9f: Redact InertialWorld test that didn't have any useful expectations, and then use AutoLogFixture instead of ServerFixture

The final change is a quick fix to enable valgrind for all types of tests, not just GUI tests (see pull request #2075 for more info).

* 4a26e39: Enable valgrind for all tests, not just GUI tests
